meaning_mnemonic: You're sliding some dirt around with a tree you cut down. This contraption you've made is called a <radical>plow</radical>. Use it to push dirt around!
Stand up on the moon so you can look down on your countries. The thing with all the lines and borders are the borders of all the countries you rule, for you are an <radical>imperial</radical>.

You know the animal radical. This is just like that with a little extra. It's an animal already... which means all you have to do is remember what kind of animal. In this case, it's a <radical>badger</radical>.
